The lessons of Black history—from the Atlanta washerwoman's strike, to Dorothy Bolden’s fight for domestic workers—will not be lost.

Many have told me they think the pro-justice & worker provisions in the Green New Deal are “unnecessary.”

Yet this example is why a just transition is vital. Without it, oil barons turn into energy barons, & workers are hurt all the same.

Bright Power must be held accountable. https://twitter.com/laurenkgurley/status/1197561319412707328 QT @LaurenKGurley SCOOP: These NYC construction workers (inspired by @AOC's Green New Deal) formed the first union at a solar energy company in the state. On Monday, the company fired all of them. https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/evjenn/this-solar-energy-company-fired-its-construction-crew-after-they-unionized

While I hope the Administration will act without further delay on its prior proposal to ban flavors that appeal to kids, I will also continue to push for my legislation that bans flavors, ensures that vaping cartridges are tamper-proof, and bans e-cigarettes from schools.

I’m inspired by the people of Nashville who are building a grassroots movement to ban private prisons from their community. In a Warren administration, we’ll ban them at the federal level. https://wpln.org/post/nashville-council-member-moves-to-end-private-prison-operator-contract/

I’m gonna try to make up Trump voters. 1 Let’s have them pumping gas; my driver told me regular people do that. 2 Let’s have them curse constantly; that’ll seem realistic. 3 These yokels don’t care about jobs or guns or the border; nope, Ukraine is their big issue. Perfect! https://twitter.com/joncoopertweets/status/1197579254835351554 QT @joncoopertweets Overheard two middle-aged guys who were pumping gas next to me just now... ⛽️

Guy #1: "I'm f*cking embarrassed that I voted for Trump. What a f*cking traitor."
Guy #2: "F*ck all the Republicans. Worthless pieces of sh*t."

China is exploiting American research institutions and universities to steal U.S. intellectual property, which means American taxpayers are funding China's quest for world dominance. We must work with these institutions, @StateDept & @FBI to combat China’s Thousand Talents Plan. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EJ_CbbgW4AMoaKu.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1197889362551283714/vid/480x270/JdTVsdso9IrJw1co.mp4?tag=13

RT @TeamPelosi Since my first day in Congress, combating HIV & AIDS has been a priority of mine. This quilt has stood as a tribute to those we’ve lost.

Know that I won't stop fighting until this scourge is resigned to the history books. -NP #CA12 #TBT https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1197338094007148544 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1197620251946557441/pu/img/ZzEwUeLYFyaaVSsH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1197620251946557441/pu/vid/320x240/8qsPHgoIR3d3tWOe.mp4?tag=10 QT @NPR The AIDS Memorial Quilt is returning home to San Francisco, where it was first conceived and created in 1987 as an artistic expression to memorialize the lives of more than 105,000 people who died of AIDS or related illnesses.
https://trib.al/rVur1mT

5 years ago, 12-year-old Tamir Rice was gunned down by a cop who saw this child as a man—yet he would still be a child today. Even in death, Tamir's innocence was stolen.

We need racial bias training at all levels of law enforcement & do more to protect our Black children.

Last month, I called on the State Department IG to investigate who at State worked with Giuliani on Trump’s scheme to extort Ukraine.

This week, Sondland confirmed that Pompeo & officials at State knew about it while it was happening. We need this independent investigation now.

I stand with them. Landlords should not be allowed to raise rents to whatever they want, whenever they want.

Grateful to be in this fight alongside you, @AyannaPressley! https://twitter.com/AyannaPressley/status/1197714533852336128 QT @AyannaPressley Too often those on the frontlines of the fight for economic, racial and social justice have been relegated to the footnotes of history.

Not in this movement.

We are bringing forward the stories of those who went before, and speaking our truth.

Climate change has fueled massive floods across Iowa. These three levees alone protect more than 20,000 Iowans and $2.9 billion in property. We cannot afford to do nothing. President Xi & the Chinese Communist Party cannot silence the US Congress. In case they aren’t familiar with how our Constitution works, the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act passed the House and Senate by overwhelming veto-proof majorities and it will become law.

All workers should have the right to collectively bargain and strike. https://twitter.com/transportworker/status/1198057631484698624 QT @transportworker The NYS Taylor prohibiting public sector strikes is antiquated and skewed in favor of the employer.
